name: CJ McCollum
details: McCollum (not with team) will not play Friday against the Nuggets.

name: Zaccharie Risacher
details: Risacher (knee) has been ruled out for Friday's game in Denver.

name: Kristaps Porzingis
details: Porzingis (Achilles) has been ruled out for Friday's game against the Nuggets.

name: Corey Kispert
details: Kispert (not with team) will not play Friday against the Nuggets.

name: N'Faly Dante
details: Dante will undergo season-ending surgery to repair a torn ACL in his right knee, Michael Scotto of USA Today reports.

name: Josh Minott
details: Minott (ankle) will not play Friday against the Raptors.

name: Jayson Tatum
details: The Celtics have not ruled Tatum (Achilles) out for the 2025-26 season, ESPN's Shams Charania reported on the Pat McAfee Show on Thursday.

name: Ben Saraf
details: Saraf is out for Friday's game against the Clippers due to left knee soreness.

name: E.J. Liddell
details: Liddell won't play Friday against the Clippers due to right knee soreness.

name: Haywood Highsmith
details: Highsmith (knee) has been ruled out for Wednesday's game against the Magic.

name: Grant Williams
details: Williams (knee) is listed as probable for Saturday's game against Utah.

name: Tidjane Salaun
details: Salaun is  probable for Saturday's game against the Jazz due to a left ankle sprain.

name: Ryan Kalkbrenner
details: Kalkbrenner (elbow) is probable to play Saturday in Utah.

name: Mason Plumlee
details: Plumlee underwent surgery to address his right groin injury and will be reevaluated in six weeks, the Hornets announced.

name: Zach Collins
details: Collins is out for Saturday's game against Dallas due to a sprained right toe.

name: Jalen Smith
details: Smith is questionable for Saturday's game against the Mavericks due to a concussion.

name: Kevin Huerter
details: Huerter (back) is questionable for Saturday's game against the Mavericks.

name: Yuki Kawamura
details: Kawamura (lower leg) signed a two-way contract with the Bulls on Tuesday, Michael Scotto of USA Today reports.

name: Josh Giddey
details: Giddey (hamstring) will be re-evaluated in two weeks, Joel Lorenzi of The Athletic reports.

name: Noa Essengue
details: Essengue will undergo left shoulder surgery and will miss the remainder of the 2025-26 season, K.C. Johnson of Chicago Sports Network reports.

name: Dean Wade
details: Wade (knee) won't play Saturday versus the Timberwolves.

name: Max Strus
details: Strus (foot) is expected to miss at least four more weeks, Marc J. Spears of ESPN.com reports.

name: Chris Livingston
details: Livingston agreed to a two-way contract with the Cavaliers on Friday, Shams Charania of ESPN reports.

name: P.J. Washington
details: Washington (ankle) has been ruled out for Saturday's game in Chicago.

name: Brandon Williams
details: Williams is out  for Saturday's game against the Bulls due to an illness.

name: Anthony Davis
details: Davis sustained ligament damage in his left hand and could miss "number of months," ESPN's Shams Charania reports.

name: Dereck Lively II
details: Lively successfully underwent surgery on his right foot Sunday.

name: Kyrie Irving
details: Irving (knee) remains out indefinitely and doesn't have a return timetable, Mavericks reporter Grant Afseth said during an appearance on HoopsHype's podcast 'Around the Beat' on Friday.

name: Dante Exum
details: The Mavericks announced Thursday that Exum will undergo season-ending knee surgery.

name: Jamal Murray
details: Murray (ankle) has been ruled out for Friday's game versus the Hawks.

name: Spencer Jones
details: Jones (ankle/illness) has been ruled out for Friday's game against Atlanta.

name: Jonas Valanciunas
details: Valanciunas will be re-evaluated in four weeks for a right calf strain that he suffered during the Nuggets' 106-103 win over the Raptors on Wednesday, Shams Charania of ESPN reports.

name: Nikola Jokic
details: Jokic will miss at least four weeks with a hyperextended left knee, ESPN's Shams Charania reports.

name: Cameron Johnson
details: Johnson will be reevaluated in 4-to-6 weeks due to a right knee contusion, Shams Charania of ESPN reports.

name: Tamar Bates
details: The Nuggets announced Monday that Bates (foot) will be re-evaluated in 12 weeks.

name: Jalen Duren
details: Duren (ankle) has been ruled out for Saturday's game against the Clippers.

name: Cade Cunningham
details: Cunningham (wrist) is questionable for Saturday's game versus the Clippers.

name: Wendell Moore Jr.
details: Moore will sign a two-way contract with the Pistons, Michael Scotto of USA Today reports.

name: Tobias Harris
details: Harris (hip) will be re-evaluated in two weeks, Omari Sankofa II of the Detroit Free Press reports.

name: L.J. Cryer
details: Cryer has been ruled out for Thursday's game against the Mavericks due to a low back strain.

name: Seth Curry
details: Curry underwent an MRI that revealed a sciatic nerve issue in his lower back/pelvis and will be re-evaluated in two weeks, Anthony Slater of ESPN.com reports.

name: Isaiah Crawford
details: Crawford is out  for Friday's game against Portland with an illness.

name: Tari Eason
details: Eason will not return to Friday's game against the Trail Blazers due to a right ankle sprain, Will Guillory of The Athletic reports.

name: Alperen Sengun
details: Head coach Ime Udoka said Monday that Sengun (ankle) is likely to miss around two weeks, Lachard Binkley of SI.com reports.

name: Fred VanVleet
details: VanVleet suffered a torn ACL and may be out for the entire 2025-26 campaign, Shams Charania of ESPN reports.

name: Andrew Nembhard
details: Nembhard (back) is listed as questionable for Saturday's game against the Heat.

name: Isaiah Jackson
details: Jackson is out  for Saturday's game against Miami with a concussion.

name: Bennedict Mathurin
details: Pacers' head coach Rick Carlisle said Sunday that Mathurin (thumb) will be out "a while."

name: Obi Toppin
details: Toppin will undergo surgery to place a screw in his right foot Monday, Dustin Dopirak of The Indianapolis Star reports.

name: Tyrese Haliburton
details: Haliburton will miss the entire 2025-26 season while recovering from surgery on his right Achilles tendon, Shams Charania of ESPN reports.

name: Bogdan Bogdanovic
details: Bogdanovic (hamstring) will remain in Los Angeles during the team's upcoming three-game road trip, Tomer Azarly of ClutchPoints.com reports.

name: Derrick Jones Jr.
details: Jones has been diagnosed with a Grade 2 MCL sprain in his right knee and will be re-evaluated in six weeks, Shams Charania of ESPN reports.

name: Bradley Beal
details: Beal will undergo season-ending surgery on his left hip, ESPN's Shams Charania reports.

name: Rui Hachimura
details: Head coach JJ Redick told reporters Friday that there is "a lot of optimism" that Hachimura (calf) will be cleared to return Monday against the Kings, Daniel Starkand of LakersNation.coml reports.

name: Adou Thiero
details: Thiero will miss at least four weeks with a right MCL sprain, Law Murray of The Athletic reports.

name: Austin Reaves
details: Reaves has been diagnosed with a grade 2 left gastrocnemius strain and will be re-evaluated in approximately four weeks, Dan Woike of The Athletic reports.

name: Kentavious Caldwell-Pope
details: Caldwell-Pope (jaw) exited Friday's 117-116 loss to the Thunder in the second quarter and did not return.

name: John Konchar
details: Konchar (thumb) has been ruled out for Friday's game against the Thunder.

name: Ja Morant
details: The Grizzlies are entertaining offers to potentially move Morant (calf) ahead of the Feb. 5 NBA trade deadline, ESPN's Shams Charania reports.

name: Brandon Clarke
details: Clarke (calf) has sustained a Grade 2 right calf strain and will be reevaluated in about three weeks.

name: Zach Edey
details: Edey (ankle) will be re-evaluated in about four weeks, Shams Charania of ESPN reports.

name: Ty Jerome
details: Jerome (calf) will be held out of games for at least 6-to-9 weeks.

name: Scotty Pippen Jr.
details: Pippen will undergo a procedure for a left big toe injury and will be re-evaluated in 12 weeks, ESPN's Shams Charania reported Saturday.

name: Terry Rozier
details: The NBA placed Rozier on immediate leave from the Heat on Thursday, ESPN's Shams Charania reports.

name: Taurean Prince
details: The Bucks applied for a Disabled Player Exception for Prince earlier this month, indicating that they anticipate that he's "substantially more likely than not" to be unable to play through June 15, Eric Nehm of The Athletic reports.

name: Mike Conley
details: Conley is out  for Saturday's game against the Cavaliers for rest purposes.

name: Anthony Edwards
details: Edwards (injury maintenance) is questionable for Saturday's game versus the Cavaliers.

name: Julius Randle
details: Randle (thumb) is listed as questionable for Saturday's game against the Cavaliers.

name: Rocco Zikarsky
details: The Timberwolves assigned Zikarsky to their G League affiliate on Sunday.

name: Terrence Shannon Jr.
details: Shannon underwent an MRI that revealed a left foot abductor hallucis strain and will be re-evaluated in two weeks, Charlie Walton of ZoneCoverage.com reports.

name: Herbert Jones
details: Jones (ankle) will not play Friday against the Wizards, Jim Eichenhofer of the Pelicans' official site reports.

name: Jose Alvarado
details: Alvarado is out for Friday's game against the Wizards due to left oblique soreness.

name: Saddiq Bey
details: Bey is out for Friday's game against the Wizards due to a right hip flexor strain.

name: Dejounte Murray
details: Pelicans head coach James Borrego said Sunday that Murray (Achilles) is "making a lot of progress" but doesn't appear to be close to making his season debut, Rod Walker of The New Orleans Times-Picayune reports. "We hope to get him back in our building here soon. He's doing a lot of work getting ready to get back here," Borrego said of Murray. "I say in the next month we'll have a little bit more clarity on where he's at. But he's made a lot of progress. Significant progress."

name: Guerschon Yabusele
details: Yabusele (quadriceps) has been ruled out for Friday's game against the Suns.

name: Landry Shamet
details: Shamet is out  for Friday's game against the Suns with a right shoulder sprain.

name: Josh Hart
details: Hart (ankle) has been cleared for light court work and will be re-evaluated in one week, Ian Begley of SportsNet New York reports.

name: Cason Wallace
details: Wallace (toe) won't play in Friday's game against Memphis, Clemente Almanza of USA Today reports.

name: Chet Holmgren
details: Holmgren has been ruled out for Friday's gam against the Grizzlies due to bilateral shins soreness, Clemente Almanza of USA Today reports.

name: Shai Gilgeous-Alexander
details: Gilgeous-Alexander Clemente Almanza of USA Today for Friday's game in Memphis due to an ankle sprain.

name: Jaylin Williams
details: Williams (heel) is out for Friday's game against Memphis, Clemente Almanza of USA Today reports.

name: Isaiah Hartenstein
details: Hartenstein (soleus) will remain on the sidelines for Friday's game in Memphis, Clemente Almanza of USA Today reports.

name: Nikola Topic
details: Topic has been diagnosed with testicular cancer, Thunder general manager Sam Presti announced Thursday, Justin Martinez of The Oklahoman reports.

name: Thomas Sorber
details: The Thunder announced Friday that Sorber has sustained a torn ACL in his right knee during an offseason workout, NBA reporter Marc Stein reports.

name: Tristan da Silva
details: Da Silva (back) has been ruled out for Friday's game against the 76ers.

name: Franz Wagner
details: Wagner (ankle) is out for Friday's game against the 76ers.

name: Moritz Wagner
details: Wagner (knee) is out for Friday's game against the 76ers.

name: Jalen Suggs
details: Suggs (knee) will not play Friday against the 76ers.

name: Colin Castleton
details: The Magic plan to sign Castleton to a two-way deal, Michael Scotto of USA Today reports.

name: Jalen Green
details: Green (hamstring) is out for Friday's game against the Knicks, Duane Rankin of The Arizona Republic reports.

name: Jamaree Bouyea
details: Bouyea (concussion) has been ruled out for Friday's game against the Knicks, Duane Rankin of The Arizona Republic reports.

name: Kris Murray
details: Murray (back) is out for Friday's game against the Rockets.

name: Robert Williams III
details: Williams will not return to Friday's game against the Rockets due to a right knee injury.

name: Jrue Holiday
details: Holiday is out for Friday's game against the Rockets with a right calf strain.

name: Jerami Grant
details: Grant (Achilles) will remain on the inactive list for Friday's game versus Houston.

name: Matisse Thybulle
details: Portland announced Thursday that Thybulle is also dealing with right knee tendinopathy while also ramping up from thumb surgery.

name: Scoot Henderson
details: Henderson (hamstring) will be re-evaluated in two weeks, Sean Highkin of Rip City Radio 620 Portland reports.

name: Blake Wesley
details: Wesley underwent a successful procedure to repair a fracture of the fifth metatarsal base in his right foot Wednesday, and he's expected to be sidelined for 8-12 weeks, Brett Siegel of ClutchPoints.com reports.

name: Damian Lillard
details: Lillard won't be back on the court for the 2025-26 season, as he made clear during an interview with YouTube influencer Speed on Wednesday.

name: Isaiah Stevens
details: Stevens signed a two-year, two-way contract with the Kings on Tuesday, Michael Scotto of USA Today reports.

name: Keegan Murray
details: Murray (ankle), who won't play in Monday's game against Dallas, is expected to miss at least three weeks, NBA reporter Marc Stein reports.

name: Domantas Sabonis
details: Sabonis (knee) will be sidelined for at least 4-to-5 more weeks, NBA reporter Marc Stein reports.

name: Julian Champagnie
details: Champagnie is questionable for Saturday's contest against the Celtics due to mid-back soreness.

name: Devin Vassell
details: Vassell is out for Saturday's game against Boston due to a left adductor strain, Paul Garcia of ProjectSpurs.com reports.

name: Brandon Ingram
details: Ingram (thumb) won't play in Friday's game against Boston, Justin Turpin of WEEI.com reports.

name: Scottie Barnes
details: Branes (knee) has been ruled out for Friday's game in Boston, Justin Turpin of WEEI.com reports.

name: RJ Barrett
details: Barrett (ankle) has been ruled out for the rest of Friday's game against the Celtics, Blake Murphy of Sportsnet.ca reports.

name: Jakob Poeltl
details: Poeltl (back) will not play Friday against the Celtics.

name: Chucky Hepburn
details: Hepburn produced 17 points (6-10 FG, 1-4 3Pt, 2-2 FT), 15 assists, two rebounds and three steals in 35 minutes of Wednesday's 115-108 G League win over the Delaware Blue Coats.

name: Lauri Markkanen
details: Markkanen (rest) has been ruled out for Saturday's game against the Hornets.

name: Jusuf Nurkic
details: Nurkic (toe) is questionable for Saturday's game versus the Hornets.

name: Ace Bailey
details: Bailey (hip) has been ruled out for Saturday's game against the Hornets.

name: Elijah Harkless
details: Harkless finished Monday's 105-103 win over the Celtics with three points (1-4 FG, 0-2 3Pt, 1-1 FT), one rebound, two assists and one steal across 21 minutes.

name: Georges Niang
details: Niang (foot) has been ruled out for Tuesday's game against the Celtics.

name: Walker Kessler
details: Kessler will undergo left shoulder surgery and will miss the remainder of the 2025-26 season, Tony Jones of The Athletic reports.

name: Trae Young
details: Young (quadriceps) will not play Friday against the Pelicans.

name: Cam Whitmore
details: Whitmore is out indefinitely due to deep vein thrombosis in his right shoulder, Shams Charania of ESPN reports.
